00011111011111010 01001010010000010 0 -> sum: z1101001101111100, cout: 0
00111000010001001 01000111110010111 1 -> sum: z0000000000100001, cout: 1
00101010101000001 01010101010001011 0 -> sum: z1111111111001100, cout: 0
00110011010000011 00000001111111000 1 -> sum: z0110101001111100, cout: 0
01111001000100010 01111000101001010 1 -> sum: z1110001101101101, cout: 1
00011001001110110 01010010001011101 0 -> sum: z1101011011010011, cout: 0
